title: Stage Lv8-C4-S24
description: Level 8 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: To succeed in business, one must be persistent.

learning_points: Level 8 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: To succeed in business, one must be persistent.

sentences.en: Being well-prepared, she felt confident about the interview.
Despite the challenges, we persevered and succeeded.

sentences.en: Being experienced, he can solve complex problems easily.

sentences.kr: 한정된 예산에도 불구하고 프로젝트는 성공적으로 완료되었습니다.
sentences.en: Despite the limited budget, the project was completed successfully.

sentences.kr: 충분히 검토되었기 때문에 제안서는 승인될 가능성이 높습니다.
